articles.title: Bangkok Post - Photo gallery | Bangkok Post
articles.summary: Debris and flood damaged goods line the streets of the Hat Yai Nai area in tambon Khuan Lang of Hat Yai district in Songkhla on Friday, as residents emerged to clean up after floodwaters receded. Authorities said the death toll from severe flooding across the South had risen to 145, with Songkhla accounting for the majority at 110 fatalities.
